short_description: Delicious chicken stir-fry with vegetables in a savory sauce.
ingredients:
• . 550 g chicken
  • . 120 ml soy sauce
  • . 200 g basil leaf
  • . 400 g mushroom

short_description: A flavorful vegetable curry packed with spices and served with rice.
ingredients:
• . 300 g mixed vegetables
  • . 250 ml coconut milk
  • . 100 g curry paste
  • . 150 g rice

short_description: A light and fresh pasta dish loaded with seasonal vegetables and herbs.
ingredients:
• . 400 g pasta
  • . 200 g cherry tomatoes
  • . 100 g spinach
  • . 50 g Parmesan cheese

short_description: Juicy grilled salmon fillets marinated in a zesty lemon herb sauce.
ingredients:
• . 4 salmon fillets
  • . 100 ml lemon juice
  • . 50 g dill
  • . 30 g garlic

short_description: A classic Italian salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil, drizzled with balsamic glaze.
ingredients:
• . 300 g cherry tomatoes
  • . 200 g fresh mozzarella
  • . 50 g basil leaves
  • . 30 ml balsamic glaze

short_description: Moist and flavorful banana bread with a hint of cinnamon, perfect for breakfast or snack.
ingredients:
• . 3 ripe bananas
  • . 200 g flour
  • . 100 g sugar
  • . 50 g butter
